pages.text: These small, six-legged dragons spawn in groups and are found in several biomes. Attack one Roost Stalker, and the whole group of them will turn hostile. Look out: If given the chance, Roost Stalkers will steal items out of chests.

pages.title: Taming
pages.text: They love eggs and can be tamed with them. If empty handed you can put the Roost Stalker on your head.

pages.title: Food
pages.text: You can give them items to hold. They heal by chewing on meat. They can also be given swords to increase damage.
